name: Shoebox
desc: Minimalist and modern, Shoebox fixtures are ideal for professional locations like business parking lots and retail zones, as well as for roadway lighting. These fixtures are also attractive but durable, accommodating both high-pressure sodium and metal halide bulbs.
features: Available in Amber Glow Light (High Pressure Sodium)
Available in Bright White Light (Metal Halide)
Office Park, retail parking lots and roadway lighting.

name: Open Bottom
desc: Open Bottom fixtures provide a pool of circular light directly below the head of the fixture. As such, they are perfect for situations where clients want to illuminate a relatively small zone very well, without excess light “escaping.” Open Bottom lighting is therefore a great choice for residential backyards and driveways.
features: Available in Bright White Light (Metal Halide)
Available in Amber Glow Light (High Pressure Sodium)
Area lighting. Primarily residential backyards and driveways

name: Cobra
desc: Durable and well-protected from the elements, Cobra lighting is a great choice for high-traffic public areas like parking lot entryways and access roads. Cobra fixtures provide a conical lighting arc and accommodate high-pressure sodium bulbs.
features: Available in Amber Glow Light (High Pressure Sodium)
Available in Bright White Light (Metal Halide)

name: Directional / Flood
desc: Ideal for situations where lighting needs can vary, Directional/Flood fixtures can be positioned to provide the best illumination required on any given day. These flexible fixtures also accommodate both high-pressure sodium and metal halide bulbs.
features: Available in Amber Glow Light (High Pressure Sodium)
Available in Bright White Light (Metal Halide)

name: Traditionaire
desc: These elegant fixtures are the go-to option for lighting that will be placed in high-visibility locations like parks, gardens and well-traveled residential streets. The traditional design mirrors an antique gas-lamp and can be fitted with high-pressure sodium bulbs.
features: Available in Amber Glow Light (High Pressure Sodium)
Subdivision, Apartment Multi-Family, Office Park, Retail, and Roadway Lighting

name: Acorn
desc: A good compromise between form and elegance, Acorn fixtures are extremely flexible and are perfect for housing subdivisions, roadways and office external areas. They can be fitted with both high-pressure sodium and metal halide bulbs.
features: Available in Amber Glow Light (High Pressure Sodium)
Available in Bright White Light (Metal Halide)
Subdivision, Apartment Multi family, Office Park, Retail, and Roadway Lighting
